item.title: 5 Reasons Your Blog Needs an App - TechiNews24.com
item.description:
5 Reasons Your Blog Needs an App - TechiNews24.com

In the recent years, mobile apps have gained an upper hand over web browsers both in terms of screen time and revenue. Mobile apps are changing the way we shop, share, search and read. More and more readers are switching to apps for quenching their reading pangs.

item.title: The Great Barrier Reef's Best Hope Is a Killer Robot
item.description:
The Great Barrier Reef's Best Hope Is a Killer Robot

Crown-of-thorns starfish are the zombies of the sea. They won't die even if you cut them in half. To kill one, you must dismember it completely-or inject it with poisonous (to them) bile salts. Instead of braaains, these zombies munch coral, and off the coast of Australia, infestations of the beasts are damaging the Great Barrier Reef at an alarming rate.

item.title: 50 Apps and Websites to Optimize Your Vacation
item.description:
50 Apps and Websites to Optimize Your Vacation

Everyone has an airport horror story. But you can make the most of a bad situation with apps like Flight+, which will keep you abreast of the latest delays and gate changes. And if you need a shower, unlimited Wi-Fi, or a work space during your extended layover, LoungeBuddy will alert you as to which free and pay-as-you-go lounges are available.

item.title: 100 Stunning Picture Quotes That Will Supercharge Your Creativity
item.description:
100 Stunning Picture Quotes That Will Supercharge Your Creativity

Find your next favorite quote rendered in stunning graphic design.

item.title: Instagram for Business
item.description:
Instagram for Business

Social media is an incredibly powerful tool - and Instagram is one of the most powerful, so why not use it to its full advantage? With well over 400 million users worldwide, there is an incredibly large audience just waiting to discover your brand.

item.title: Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open
item.description:
Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open

It's been a big year for Lavazza. Not only is it their 120th anniversary, they've also partnered with the Italian Pavillon at the World Exposition Milan 2015 and expanded their tennis partnerships to include a sponsorship of the US Open.
